original_solution_mapping.L1: At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 10/100 = <<100*10/100=10>>10 meters more.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=110>>110 meters.
original_solution_mapping.L3: At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 110 x 10/100 = <<110*10/100=11>>11 meters more.
original_solution_mapping.L4: So, its height at the end of 2019 is 110 + 11 = <<110+11=121>>121 meters.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Therefore, the tree has grown 121 - 100 = <<121-100=21>>21 meters.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 181.
    Returns: the total growth of the tree.
    """
    # L1
    initial_height = 100 # 100 meters tall
    growth_percentage = Fraction(10, 100) # 10% more than its previous height
    growth_2018 = initial_height * growth_percentage

    # L2
    height_end_2018 = initial_height + growth_2018

    # L3
    growth_2019 = height_end_2018 * growth_percentage

    # L4
    height_end_2019 = height_end_2018 + growth_2019

    # L5
    total_growth = height_end_2019 - initial_height

    # FA
    answer = total_growth
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: At the end of 2018, the tree will grow {initial_height} x {growth_percentage} = <<{initial_height}*{growth_percentage}={growth_2018}>>{growth_2018} meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is {initial_height} + {growth_2018} = <<{initial_height}+{growth_2018}={height_end_2018}>>{height_end_2018} meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow {height_end_2018} x {growth_percentage} = <<{height_end_2018}*{growth_percentage}={growth_2019}>>{growth_2019} meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is {height_end_2018} + {growth_2019} = <<{height_end_2018}+{growth_2019}={height_end_2019}>>{height_end_2019} meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown {height_end_2019} - {initial_height} = <<{height_end_2019}-{initial_height}={total_growth}>>{total_growth} meters.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=110>>110 meters.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 110 x 10/100 = <<110*10/100=11>>11 meters more.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: So, its height at the end of 2019 is 110 + 10 = <<110+10=120>>120 meters.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: Therefore, the tree has grown 120 - 100 = <<120-100=20>>20 meters.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'growth_2018' (value: 10) was used instead of 'growth_2019' (value: 11).
